standard_metadata.standard_description: Solve linear equations in one variable.

hints.content: Vertical angles are congruent to each other!
Set the angle measures equal to one another.   $\blue{8x + 14^\circ} = \green{6x + 34^\circ}$
Vertical angles are congruent to each other!
